mapper.update: update app_picture set picture_url = #{pictureUrl} where viproom_id = #{viproomId}
mapper.select:
select
from app_picture
dtflag=0
and imagetype=#{imagetype}

mapper.update:
update app_picture
viproom_id = #{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture_url = #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
click_url = #{clickUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},

descr = #{descr},
where picture_id = #{pictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update app_picture set viproom_id = #{viproomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_url = #{clickUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},imagetype = #{imagetype},descr = #{descr} where picture_id = #{pictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
